Please feel free to contact me if you have any questions about workshops, prices or orders.

Please note: I no longer answer ceramic questions via email, messages or phone.Â If you have questions about clay, glaze, tools or techniques you can always book a personal advice session with me.

By filling out my contact form and clicking "send" you give permission for me to keep your details such as name and email address. I use this information exclusively to contact you.
